A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There are those who hate this film because it's "filled with SJWs". This is not one of those reviews.

After seeing The Force Awakens\, I was interested. It was a rebuild of ep 4\, with a splash of 5 thrown in. OK\, so it's a 200m$ fan film. That's fine\, we're doing a reboot I guess. But I had a caveat- with all the questions that were opened my the infamous mystery box director\, then the next movie(s) really need to step up to the plate\, and give us answers. 

That didn't happen. Nothing gets answered. And the answers you do get are so incredibly underwhelming you'll be in disbelief. I was disappointed in the climatic light-saber fight scene. That's bad.
